609240.name: Future Unfolding Original Soundtrack
609240.description:
Future Unfolding 原声集由 Thomas Carleberg & Emil Nilsson 创作

1. The Drop Is a Small Ocean (00:37)
2. Wilfred, What Waits in the Wilderness (01:35)
3. Pathless (04:48)
4. Patterns (01:18)
5. Turn When You See Me (02:11)
6. In Search of the Wild (02:13)
7. Death Can Open up a Door (01:26)
8. Rhetor (02:28)
9. Badabing, Badabum (01:14)
10. Altered the Constellation (02:20)
11. Good and Bad Are but Names (02:19)
12. Don’t Even Think of Taking Over (04:56)
13. Future Unfolding (03:04)

购买后你可以在 steam 路径：...Steam\steamapps\common\FutureUnfolding\soundtrack 下找到它们。
